title: Understanding Image Positioning
text: When you insert an image as 'Image over cells', it floats independently of the cells below it.

title: Functions of 'Image over cells'
text: Think of 'Image over cells' as a layer situated on top of your entire spreadsheet, allowing free movement and resizing.

title: Interaction with Spreadsheet Data
text: This image positioning does not affect the data within the cells. It works like a decal applied to the surface of the sheet.

title: When to Use 'Image over cells'
text: Consider using this option when the image should be visible throughout multiple operations on the data, or when aesthetics is a higher priority than cell-specific anchoring.
